name: Obsolete (itch)
description:
Obsolete is a two player co-op game created during Global Game Jam 15 by a team of 3 people.

The two players have to work together to complete the level or they can simply annoy/sabotage each other. The two players control their own lanes having to time their actions together. Mechanics featured simply door triggers ranging to total lane swaps. The last level is a map for the players to brawl on but this isn't fully implemented due to time constraints(the broken makes it more fun).

Controls - The game is best with two controllers but is also playable with the keyboard.

Controller - Y to jump, analogue to move, Back to restart level and start to skip.

Keyboard - Player 1: ASD, Space. Player 2: Arrows and right CTRL. R to restart level. O to skip levels.
